pages.text: $(l:herbs/infernal_bulb)Infernal Bulbs$() grow on magmatic soil.$(p)Other plants grown on magmatic soil will have drops cooked when harvested, if cookable. In addition, each plant harvested may drop experience.

$(l:herbs/dewgonia)Dewgonia$() grows on aquatic soil.$(p)Normal plants grown on the soil will be harvested automagically, the drops placed in containers below the soil or on the surface if none exists. $(info) Gravel beneath prevents this behaviour.
$(l:herbs/cloud_berry)Cloud Berries$() grow on caelic, air-bound soil.$(p)Normal plants can also be grown on caelic soil, and the soil will grow them much faster than normal.
$(l:herbs/stalicripe)Stalicripe$() grow on terran soil.$(p)Normal plants can also be grown on terran soil, and the fertile earth will yield much more for the crop.
